title: HELP ME PLEASE! Regarding skin purchases on PBE

replies.body: Sometimes new content like skins might appear on the PBE, but it's not there for exclusivity.  They're intended for testers to help with any bugs or issues to tinker out before release.  You can sign up for the PBE [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Applications aren't guaranteed and it can take some time.  Good luck!
